about_the_game:
Delve deeper into INCUBUS with this unsettling, and disturbing, soundtrack. Things start off as normal, another day on the job 'ghost hunting' a normal looking house. A bit of London morning radio blends away as paranormal forces seep into the ambiance. The house is definitely haunted! The soundtrack blends elements of real-world modern London, with old Wartime Radio and the sounds generated by supernatural forces.

Produced by the game developer, Jonathan Boakes, the soundtrack is composed of elements you hear during the game, an audio ghost hunt, as sounds like the Grandfather Clock and ghost gadgets exist on the periphery of audio perception. "I really want listeners to feel like they're in a haunted house, from everyday beginnings to the dark chanting of the climax, voices, technology and atmospheric tone mixing to create an auditory experience.
detailed_description:
Delve deeper into INCUBUS with this unsettling, and disturbing, soundtrack. Things start off as normal, another day on the job 'ghost hunting' a normal looking house. A bit of London morning radio blends away as paranormal forces seep into the ambiance. The house is definitely haunted! The soundtrack blends elements of real-world modern London, with old Wartime Radio and the sounds generated by supernatural forces.

Produced by the game developer, Jonathan Boakes, the soundtrack is composed of elements you hear during the game, an audio ghost hunt, as sounds like the Grandfather Clock and ghost gadgets exist on the periphery of audio perception. "I really want listeners to feel like they're in a haunted house, from everyday beginnings to the dark chanting of the climax, voices, technology and atmospheric tone mixing to create an auditory experience.

short_description: Ambiance and music from the video game INCUBUS. Blending creepy mood setting with vintage 'Wartime' radio, the INCUBUS Soundtrack is an unsettling 20 tracks, good for Halloween or spooking your friends.
